column1: Little Goat Diner////This is high-end diner food: a trendy mix of French
column3: with Asian accents. Their "sammiches" are popular
column4: especially the ginormous "Los Drowned." I had the Tuna Melt
column5: which was not really a tuna melt but more like tuna and salad slathered on two slices of bread. There was so much tuna and salad that you could barely see the bread
column6: which became soggy. It was delicious though. And my friend enjoyed her Pork Belly Pancake.
